EmailTemplate.description: [Subject Line Testing A] See our Case Study: How ATM as a service transformed one credit union [Subject Line Testing B] A credit union modernized their services using ATM as a service from NCR https://www.ncr.com/green-room/scott-credit-union
EmailTemplate.name: 05-02-22 BNK ATMaaS Email 6.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: See our Case Study: How ATM as a Service transformed one credit union
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Scott Credit Union (CU) needed to upgrade its ATM network as well as improve member experiences and keep data safe. NCR helped Scott CU achieve it all with ATM as a Service. By partnering with NCR, Scott CU now has an efficient and state-of-the-art ATM network that offers the latest services and functionality to its members. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
